Description of DUT: At the location 300mm from components ortheir wiring harness, or components placedat a distance of 50mm to 200mm fromcommunications equipment,

Buttons or such kind of parts unconnectedwith wiring harness and handheldcomponents, or surfaces of components at adistance of less than 50mm from storagedevices and communications devices, or300mm from their wiring harness.
